name: A-List Girl: Spa & Beauty Salon
description:
Welcome to the luxurious Spa & Beauty Salon of the stars! A-list famous celebrities come here to pampering themselves! This Spa is known for the best beauty treatments and for the famous owner, YOU!

How to Play:

You are the owner of the salon. The clients want to look like barbie dolls in the end of your services. Everyday there is a goal (money you make) and for that you have to make your clients happy. You have to satisfy the client’s order expressed by the bubble above the client.
Touch the client to select her and then touch the desired beauty chair to sit (note the symbols) and then touch again to begin treatment.

You start off with hairdresser and facial treatments skills. As days go by, you are able to win more beauty skills!

We can have 5 different services: Hairdresser, Facial treatment, Manicure do nails, Spray Tan Booth and Waxing.
While in treatments follow arrows for directions and touch the buttons to complete actions!

Make sure to receive payment from your client before time expires! Click on the cash register to get paid.

Make money so you can shop different décor styles to change the store and be fashion!

Click in the button SHOP in gameplay screen to begin spending your hard earned cash ;)

Special chairs:

Waiting chair: Very Important! You don’t want to lose impatient clients and say were's my clients at?! This chair increases the client’s level of waiting.

Special Automatic Chair: It´s the most expensive item in the game! It’s an automatic robotic chair that does all the beauty treatments instead of you. It serves up to five clients.


Hope you enjoy this free girl game! Have fun!
